mapper.delete: DELETE FROM city WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO city (name, countrycode, district, population) VALUES ( #{name, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{countryCode, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{district, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{population, jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO city (name, countrycode, district, population) VALUES
(#{obj.name, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{obj.countryCode, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{obj.district, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{obj.population, jdbcType=INTEGER})
